i = λi.
Therefore, the eigenvectors of A⊤A, which we know are the right-
singular vectors vi, and their normalized images underA, the left-singular
vectors ui, form two self-consistent ONBs that are connected through the
singular value matrix Σ.
Let us rearrange (4.78) to obtain the singular value equationsingular value
equation
Avi = σiui, i = 1,...,r. (4.79)
